title: Typeface about crime fiction...
content:
Anyone can tell me good typeface/s for cover of crime fiction novel?

Thank you!!
author: Saratyp

comments.content: Like those of the '50s? Show us an example of what you want.

What is the title, story synopsis, and main character profiles?

ChrisL

in Pulp Fiction's marketing, both Aachen Bold and Reporter Two were used.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/reporter-2/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414004707/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/reporter-2/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/reporter-2/")

You can check some recent Rian Hughes releases at Veer for some other options.
